name: Back Home (HihiSong)
description:
Overview:

"Back Home" is a survival game that requires players to stay alive until they land on the Earth. Dodging the floating and incoming rocks, players will need to keep their suit, temperature and oxygen on a safe level, even when passing through the poison area.

You need to get back to the Earth and ask for support to save your family and colleague in space station.

This project was made by team SpaceOrange for 2019 Epic Mega Game Jam.

Control:

WASD: Move

Left Shift Button: Accelerate Down

Hold Left Mouse Button: Hook

Content Used:

Scifi and glitch Post-Process
FX variety Pack
Physically Based Earth
Industrial Props Pack 6
SDF Robo Progress bar
